content.question: The author’s claim in the second paragraph that Asian countries such as India, Japan, and Thailand, have certain cultural characteristics “in common possession” is most likely a reference to which of the following?

choices.label: A shared experience of European colonization
Shared Confucian political principles in government
Shared literary languages and ethnic origins

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
